args: Please note that this story contains spoilers\nfor Chapters 12 through 16 of the main campaign.
Prince Leonidas. Here are the status\nreports on all the territories in Alberia.

Indeed. A sense of ease is washing over
the people. It almost feels as if the war
looming over us until now was but a bad
dream.
We couldn't have done it without your\nbrilliant political insight. Thanks to you,\nAlberia has averted a true crisis.
Given the strides we've made, now might\nbe a good time to think about taking a rest,\nsir. Perhaps a vacation is in order?
No need. I don't have the luxury of resting.

We have only just avoided the worst
possible outcome. Restoring Alberia
to its former glory will be far more
laborious a task.
But Your Excellency... You've been working\ntirelessly for so long. I fear for your health.
Cease. The subject is tabled indefini—
A thousand pardons, Your Excellency.\nA messenger from the Halidom has come\nto see you.
From the Halidom, you say?\nI don't recall us arranging such a visit.
Yes, sir! He called himself Xander, sir!
Well, well! If it isn't the arrogant Alberian\nupstart. I haven't seen you since that\nsoirée!
Wha—how dare you speak to His\nExcellency Leonidas in such a way!
Pay it no mind. You'll only give yourself\na headache if you obsess over every daft\nutterance that escapes this cur's lips.
So the biggest mouth in the North has\ncome to me once more. You're just as\nirritating as ever.
How far you've fallen from grace—I hear\nyou're now a lowly general in my little\nbrother's army.
How misinformed you are. I'm no common\nfoot soldier. I've merely made the young\nprince my vassal, you see!
Your japes grow wearisome. But enough\nof that. What have you come here for?
I'm so glad you asked!\nDuty has led me here, you see...
...to regale you with tales of my\nmost glorious vacation!
Go home. I haven't the time to indulge\nyour braggadocio. Now if you'll excuse\nme, I have matters that require attention.
Playing the busy card, eh? How utterly\nunlike you. In the short time we've been\napart, you've grown awfully small-minded.
When I heard you had cast aside your\npride in favor of guiding the people,\nI was truly impressed.

But now I see you're working yourself to
death like a lowly pack mule—one who
would spurn the pleasures of summer
without a second thought!
Oh, I've thought about it. I've simply\ndecided that now is no time to relax.
Now who's being ＂wearisome＂?\nHaven't you considered how you might\nbe worrying those who serve you?
What sort of ruler causes his vassals\nundue concern?!
He who would call himself king\nmust always keep an open mind.\nOtherwise, none will follow him!
And so! You should read my vacation diary\nand learn to embrace some latitude.
*sigh* You are incorrigible.\nOf COURSE that was your ultimate goal.
I'll say it once more, and never again:\nI have no interest in your ridiculous\nsummer dia—
Hold. Am I reading this right...?
Pretty fantastic, eh? You must be awfully\njealous of what a great vacation I had!
I see. So that's what this was all about.
Fine. Just this once, I'll take your advice.
Heh. I knew you'd see reason.
No need to thank me, by the way.\nIt is a king's duty to help his vassals,\ntheir stubborn older brothers included.
But this is as far as I'll meddle.\nThe rest is up to you, Leonidas.
Just you wait and see, Xander.
I'll show you how a REAL ruler goes on\nvacation!
It has been some time indeed since\nI last set foot upon these sands...
Well, this is a relief. It's about\ntime His Excellency took a break.
Er... Well, I'm having a hard time\npicturing how His Excellency would\neven SPEND a vacation.
Now that we're here, there's only one\ntrue way to enjoy a vacation. All of you,\ncome with me.
*gulp* So begins His Excellency Leonidas's\nvacation. Who knows what lies in store?
